responses: Good to see you, how can I help you?
Hi there, how can I help?
Happy to help!
Any time!
My pleasure

patterns: What you can do for me?
responses:
I can tell you infromations about:
Student service and university
Different programs on university and what is required to get into them
Where are classrooms
University doctor
Info about sports and recreation within college and how to join them
Canteens of university
Different student associations
Where you can get your notes for study and to spend time between lectures 

Also, i can open different services for you that are available on FESB site, like Elearning, Mail, Schedule etc.

patterns: Tell me something about student service
responses:
At Student service, you can get informations about your studies and program, the necessary documents for, like, a student bus card or you can report the disappearance of an X- card or if it is invalid.
If you want some more info, I can open a website for you.

patterns: What are the working hours of student service?
responses: Student service works from 10AM to 2PM on working days

patterns: Where can i find student service?
Tell me where is student service
How can i find student service
responses: Student service is on the right side of the main entrance of college, straight down the hall.

patterns: How can I contact student service?
Give me number of student service
responses: All contacts you need you can find on webpage. I can open it for you.

patterns: Who is the competent doctor of the college?
responses: The competent doctor of college is Hajdi KrstuloviÄ‡ and her address is Bijankinijeva ulica 13 in Split.For more info, I can open a link.

Yes! FESB offers a variety of activities that you can engage in. Team sports that are offered are soccer, handball, volleyball and also picigin.
There are "Water" sports, like waterpolo, swimming, rowing and sailing.
You can also sign up for skiing, tennis, chess and even the Bridge card game, which is an elective subject of FER!
If you like workout in gym or fitness centres, you can get a discount at certain gyms, just fill the form.

patterns: Where can i fulfill the form?
responses: Form to join th gym you can find on website

patterns: Where can I spend time between lectures?
responses:
On the ground floor of the college is the Aquarium, an amphitheater with desks and Internet access, which is available to students until the close times of college. The student library is located on the second floor and you can use your time to study. If you just want to relax, there is a FESB caffe bar at the entrance from the college.
The University Library is also close and it is available until late hours. For students is available a large reading room on several floors, access to a computer for 3 hours a day and a large number of books.

Fesb offers two canteens, a snack bar ("Stop") on the ground floor and the Fesb restaurant on top of the building with a rich selection of dishes (students with an X are subsidized the price of food). To view the daily menu, visit: https: //www.scst. unist.hr/prehrana/restorani/31-restoran-fesb

patterns: Show me the menu of canteens
Where i can get materials to study?
responses: There are two copy shops, one on ground flor left from entrance and another on second floor, after stairs from entrance.

patterns: Where i can see my class schedule?
Where i can see my grades?
where i can sign for mail?
responses: All services for schedule, info about professors and classrooms, mail, grades and other you can see at link: https://www.fesb.unist.hr/studenti/

patterns: Can you show me where are computer labs
I am lost, help me find my classroom
responses: On FESB, there are 4 sections: A,B,C and D. First number signs on which floor is classroom and other two are for indexing. So, if you are looking for room C301, you will go on section C and floor 3. https://www.fesb.unist.hr/fakultet-opcenito/prostori/

patterns: I cant find library, where is it?
responses:
In library you can go study and use some books to learn some useful informations.Books are mostly on english and includes professional and scientific literature in the field of electrical engineering, informatics, mechanical engineering and shipbuilding.
You can find it on second floor, right next to the copy shop.
Library works from 8AM to 4PM.
